SELECT b.id,b.fee_description,b.fee_proportion,b.fee,b.type,c.id as point_detail_id,c.fee as point_detail_fee, ifnull(f.nick_name,e.company_name) as company_name
,d.fee as payment_fee
from maoding_web_project_cost a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_cost_point b on a.id = b.cost_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_cost_point_detail c on b.id = c.point_id
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_cost_payment_detail d on c.id = d.point_detail_id
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company e on (a.from_company_id = e.id or a.to_company_id = e.id) and e.id!= #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN maoding_web_business_partner f on f.company_id = e.id where 1=1
AND c.id = #{pointDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND d.id = #{paymentDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select if(e.task_type =10 or e.task_type =17 or e.task_type =19 or e.task_type =21 or e.task_type =29 or e.task_type =31 or e.task_type =33 , a.to_company_id,a.from_company_id) from maoding_web_project_cost a INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_cost_point b on a.id = b.cost_id INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_cost_point_detail c on b.id = c.point_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_cost_payment_detail d on c.id = d.point_detail_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_my_task e on e.target_id = c.id or e.target_id = d.id where e.id = #{taskId} LIMIT 1

select a.*,b.* from maoding_web_project_cost_point_detail a LEFT JOIN maoding_invoice b on a.invoice = b.id where a.status='0' and a.point_id = #{pointId} and (a.company_id = #{companyId} or a.relation_company_id = #{companyId}) order by a.create_date
